Click here if you want to support me without paying money. Just some time for viewing an add.
Send us your review on Google Play Store.
Find more informations about our teacher.

English with Lidia is a romanian language blog, especially created for everyone who want to learn english and have a relax moment with our teacher, Lidia + having possibility to listen what her says. Excited to share our material with more people we are ready to give you more content to everyone who want to learn english.

Le spunem povestea vieÈ›ii noastre? So, you want me to tell you the story of my life? No! He does not want to hear you telling him the story of your life. Nu, pentru cÄƒ nu suntem Brad Pitt Ã®n interview cu un vampir. Nu ne Ã®ntreabÄƒ despre viaÈ›a noastrÄƒ.. despre cÄƒÈ›el, despre pÄƒrinÈ›i. It\'s not about your life story.

i.b: Your parents, your background and your dog\'s name...

What kind of cat do you have. It is not about that. So, when people hear that question they think Oh, let me tell you my life story and 20 minutes into... you had not talk about anything important. So, what they actually asking this? What are you bringing to the table. So, from now on when you hear the question \"Tell me about yourself\" I want you to make a mental switch. That equals what value could you bring to the company.
